name: LaboratoryLabyrinth
description: All the scientist’s genetically modified creatures escaped and try to kill him. The scientist must run as killing them is not easy. The only way out is through the Laboratory Labyrinth. Only a scientific genius can unlock the doors thanks to his mind and the hidden keys. Play this game and you will incarnate the scientist while running through this 3D Lab and learning new facts. Use your knowledge against the monsters and don’t forget to run!
